metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3864 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: [descendant's dumpable setting with certain SUID binaries]

notes.Note: sbeattie> no fix upstream as of 2022-01-27

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
linux-aws package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
